title: Sudden ping increase by double
body: Hello, i usually get around 83 ping wired, but it increased by double when 7.14 came out I ask people in my games if they're getting issues and they're not I've even clean booted my computer, flushed my dns, reset my computer more than 3 times and my modem more than 4 times to try and solve the issue, but i've noticed that since I get up early at around 6:00am my ping is normal than after 1 game is goes up too 190 I'm all out of ideas and I've contacted support about it but any extra help is amazing, I also reinstalled league

replies.body:
Those ping spikes might be related to the time of day and how many people around you are actively using the internet on the same ISP. There's also a chance that this is something more related to how you ISP is physically sending your connection on it's way to our servers. 

Let's check to make sure that you aren't having any problems with packet loss first using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Use the latest network logs from a game that had those ping spikes, take screenshot using something like Gyazo, and post it here so we can go over it together.
